hard_constraints.description: Sanity check: if it's a beefy high-perf CPU, you gotta have liquid cooling.
High-end GPUs need liquid cooling or they'll melt, keep it chill.
Discrete GPUs are way too hot for passive cooling, don't even try it.
M1 and RX6700XT are just plain incompatible, total mismatch.

soft_constraints.description: Gotta squeeze out every bit of performance from the CPU.
Maxing out the GPU score is key for those frames.
Even the cooler adds to the performance points, so pick a good one.
